items.title: Is Salesforce, Inc. (CRM) a Stock That Members of Congress Own?
items.description: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Stocks That Members of Congress Own. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) stands against the stocks that members of Congress own. Members of the US Congress have historically been permitted to own and actively trade stocks, a practice [â€¦]
